10 CLS
20 PRINT@86/2,"OLD GLORY":PRINT@456/2,"THE STAR SPANGLED BANNER":PRINT@898/2,"(C) WM. MORRIS & J. COPE 1981"
21 FORZ=1TO2500:NEXT
100 CLS:REM DRAW FLAG

160 FORZ=1TO13:READX,Y:PRINT@X/2,CHR$(Y);:NEXT
170 PRINT@480,"THE BETSY ROSS FLAG 1777";

200 READUN,UL:SOUNDUN/2,UL/4:V=V+1:IFV=25THENGOSUB300
210 IFV=50THENGOSUB400
220 IFV=73THEN500
230 GOTO200

300 RETURN
400 RETURN
500 GOTO500
